Crystal UI handling

Functions

(void) + CrystalSession::deactivateCrystalPullTab
 Deactivates the Crystal pull tab user interface. This will animate the pull tab off screen.
(void) + CrystalSession::resetCrystalPullTabState
 This will animate the Crystal pull tab to the default closed postion.

 Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface with the main Crystal elements of "profile", "achievements", "leaderboards" and "challenges".

(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalPullTabOnNewsFromScreenEdge:
 Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on the 'News' screen. This is a basic news feed that features adverts and three modes of display.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalPullTabOnNewsFromScreenEdge:closed:
 Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on the 'News' screen in the specified closed state. This is a basic news feed that features adverts and three modes of display.

(void) - CrystalSessionDelegate-p::splashScreenFinishedWithActivateCrystal:
 Reports to the client that the Crystal splash screen has been dismissedAfter the Crystal splash dialog (displaySplashScreen) has been dismissed the client will be notified with this method. The method can be used to resume the normal game startup and UI, and also to immediately activate the Crystal UI and encourage sign-up.
(void) - CrystalSessionDelegate-p::crystalUiDeactivated
 Reports to the client that the Crystal UI has been closed.This is a good place to reactivate the game from a paused state and reactivate sound.
(void) - CrystalSessionDelegate-p::crystaliPadPopoversActivated:
 Reports to the client that the iPad popovers have been activated or deactivatedSome titles may wish to disable parts of their menu sytem when the Crystal popovers are visible. During the period that the popovers are visible the game's screen is greyed and the user cannot interact with your menu system. Tapping any area of the screen outside of the Crystal UI removes the grey overlay and normal interaction with your menu system can resume.
(void) + CrystalSession::lockToOrientation:
 Locks the crystal UI to the specified orientation.Just call this once after initializing the session. All orientations are supported. If your application supports more than one screen orientation use lockToOrientationList: instead.
(void) + CrystalSession::lockToOrientationList:
 Locks the crystal UI to the specified list of orientations.Just call this once after initializing the session. All orientations are supported. A typical usage of this call is to limit Crystal to only the landscape orientations like so: [CrystalSession lockToOrientationList:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:[NSNumber numberWithInt:UIDeviceOrientationLandscapeLeft], [NSNumber numberWithInt:UIDeviceOrientationLandscapeRight], nil] ];
(BOOL) + CrystalSession::isCrystalUIActive
 Determine if the Crystal UI is currently active and visible.Returns YES if active and visible, otherwise returns NO.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUI
 Activates the Crystal user interface with the default view options.On iPhone before calling this method your application should stop rendering and stop sound if not appropriate to the Crystal UI.
On iPad this method is used to activate the Crystal navigation tabs at the left of the screen. Please see http://devsupport.crystalsdk.com/default.asp?W8 for more details.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtProfile
 Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'profile' tab open.On iPhone this is equivelant to calling activateCrystalUI. On iPad this method can be used to activate the Crystal UI from a dedicated Crystal button, though the permanent overlay via activateCrystalUI is preferred. Please see http://devsupport.crystalsdk.com/default.asp?W8 for more details.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtLeaderboards
 Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'leaderboards' tab open.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtLeaderboardWithId:
 Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'leaderboards' tab open at the specified leaderboard.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtAchievements
 Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'achievements' tab open.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtAddFriends
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Add more friends' screen.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtSettings
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Settings' screen.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtGifting
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the gifting and promotions functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/promotions tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the gifting/promotions functionality visible.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtGiftsAndMarket
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the gifting and market functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/market tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the gifting/market functionality visible.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtVirtualGoods
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the virtual goods functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/promotions tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the virtual goods functionality visible.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtVirtualCurrencies
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the virtual currency functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/promotions tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the virtual currencies functionality visible.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtFindFriends
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Find Friends' screen.
(void) + CrystalSession::activateCrystalUIAtInviteFriends
 Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Invite Friends' screen.
(void) + CrystalSession::deactivateCrystalUI
 Forces the Crystal UI to be removed from view.On iPhone in normal circumstances it shouldn't be necessary to call this method, but is added for completeness in case the client receives its own notifications.
On iPad this method is used to dismiss the Crystal navigation tabs at the left of the screen.
(void) + CrystalSession::displaySplashScreen
 Displays the Crystal splash screenThis method displays the Crystal splash screen to the user above the current game UI. It is the responsibility of the developer to ensure that this dialog is displayed at an appropriate time, generally just after the game is started. When the splash screen has been dismissed splashScreenFinishedWithActivateCrystal: will be called in the delegate. Normally the game would only display this splash screen once to the user.
void CrystalUnityBasic::ActivateCrystalPullTabOn (IList< string > tabs, string edge)
 Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on a custom set of multiple tabs.
void CrystalUnityBasic::ActivateCrystalPullTabOn (IList< string > tabs, string edge, bool closedState)
 Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on a custom set of multiple tabs.
void CrystalUnityBasic::DeactivatePullTabUi ()
 Deactivates the Crystal pull tab user interface. This will animate the pull tab off screen.
void CrystalUnityBasic::ResetCrystalPullTabState ()
 This will animate the Crystal pull tab to the default closed position.

Function Documentation

+ (void) activateCrystalPullTabFromScreenEdge: (NSString *)  edgeString

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface with the main Crystal elements of "profile", "achievements", "leaderboards" and "challenges".

Parameters:
edgeStringThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
+ (void) activateCrystalPullTabFromScreenEdge: (NSString *)  edgeString
closed: (BOOL)  closedState 

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface with the main Crystal elements of "profile", "achievements", "leaderboards" and "challenges".

Parameters:
edgeStringThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
closedStateThe initial closed state of the tab
void CrystalUnityBasic::ActivateCrystalPullTabOn ( IList< string >  tabs,
string  edge 
) [inline, inherited]

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on a custom set of multiple tabs.

Parameters:
tabsArray of tabs as strings in lowercase. Valid tab strings are: "news" "profile" "settings" "leaderboards", "achievements", "challenges", "gifting", "virtualgoods", "virtualcurrencies" "giftsandmarket", "friends" "findfriends" NOTE: A maximum of four tabs will be parsed from the array and any invalid tabs will be ignored.
edgeThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
void CrystalUnityBasic::ActivateCrystalPullTabOn ( IList< string >  tabs,
string  edge,
bool  closedState 
) [inline, inherited]

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on a custom set of multiple tabs.

Parameters:
tabsArray of tabs as strings in lowercase. Valid tab strings are: "news" "profile" "settings" "leaderboards", "achievements", "challenges", "gifting", "virtualgoods", "virtualcurrencies" "giftsandmarket", "friends" "findfriends" NOTE: A maximum of four tabs will be parsed from the array and any invalid tabs will be ignored.
edgeThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
closedStateThe initial closed state of the tab
+ (void) activateCrystalPullTabOn: (NSArray *)  tabs
fromScreenEdge: (NSString *)  edgeString 

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on a custom set of multiple tabs.

Parameters:
tabsArray of tabs as strings in lowercase. Valid tab strings are: "news" "profile" "settings" "leaderboards", "achievements", "challenges", "gifting", "virtualgoods", "virtualcurrencies" "giftsandmarket", "friends" "findfriends" NOTE: A maximum of four tabs will be parsed from the array and any invalid tabs will be ignored.
edgeStringThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
+ (void) activateCrystalPullTabOn: (NSArray *)  tabs
fromScreenEdge: (NSString *)  edgeString
closed: (BOOL)  closedState 

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on a custom set of multiple tabs.

Parameters:
tabsArray of tabs as strings in lowercase. Valid tab strings are: "news" "profile" "settings" "leaderboards", "achievements", "challenges", "gifting", "virtualgoods", "virtualcurrencies" "giftsandmarket", "friends" "findfriends" NOTE: A maximum of four tabs will be parsed from the array and any invalid tabs will be ignored.
edgeStringThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
closedStateThe initial closed state of the tab

+ (void) activateCrystalPullTabOnNewsFromScreenEdge: (NSString *)  edgeString

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on the 'News' screen. This is a basic news feed that features adverts and three modes of display.

Parameters:
edgeStringThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
+ (void) activateCrystalPullTabOnNewsFromScreenEdge: (NSString *)  edgeString
closed: (BOOL)  closedState 

Activates the Crystal pull tab user interface on the 'News' screen in the specified closed state. This is a basic news feed that features adverts and three modes of display.

Parameters:
edgeStringThe edge to display the pull tab interface from, one of "right", "left", "top" or "bottom"
closedWhether the news feed is initially closed or not
closedStateThe initial closed state of the tab

+ (void) activateCrystalUI

Activates the Crystal user interface with the default view options.On iPhone before calling this method your application should stop rendering and stop sound if not appropriate to the Crystal UI.
On iPad this method is used to activate the Crystal navigation tabs at the left of the screen. Please see http://devsupport.crystalsdk.com/default.asp?W8 for more details.

+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtAchievements

Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'achievements' tab open.

See also:
activateCrystalUI
+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtAddFriends

Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Add more friends' screen.

See also:
activateCrystalUI
+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtFindFriends

Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Find Friends' screen.

+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtGifting

Activates the Crystal user interface at the gifting and promotions functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/promotions tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the gifting/promotions functionality visible.

+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtGiftsAndMarket

Activates the Crystal user interface at the gifting and market functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/market tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the gifting/market functionality visible.

+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtInviteFriends

Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Invite Friends' screen.

+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtLeaderboards

Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'leaderboards' tab open.

See also:
activateCrystalUI
+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtLeaderboardWithId: (NSString *)  leaderboardId

Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'leaderboards' tab open at the specified leaderboard.

See also:
activateCrystalUI
Parameters:
leaderboardIdThe leaderboard to be displayed
+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtProfile

Activates the Crystal user interface with the 'profile' tab open.On iPhone this is equivelant to calling activateCrystalUI. On iPad this method can be used to activate the Crystal UI from a dedicated Crystal button, though the permanent overlay via activateCrystalUI is preferred. Please see http://devsupport.crystalsdk.com/default.asp?W8 for more details.

See also:
activateCrystalUI
+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtSettings

Activates the Crystal user interface at the 'Settings' screen.

See also:
activateCrystalUI
+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtVirtualCurrencies

Activates the Crystal user interface at the virtual currency functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/promotions tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the virtual currencies functionality visible.

+ (void) activateCrystalUIAtVirtualGoods

Activates the Crystal user interface at the virtual goods functionality.If the theme for your game has a gifting/promotions tab defined this will open the Crystal UI at this tab. If the theme doesn't have this tab then the UI will be opened at the Profile tab but with the virtual goods functionality visible.

- (void) crystaliPadPopoversActivated: (BOOL)  activated [optional, inherited]

Reports to the client that the iPad popovers have been activated or deactivatedSome titles may wish to disable parts of their menu sytem when the Crystal popovers are visible. During the period that the popovers are visible the game's screen is greyed and the user cannot interact with your menu system. Tapping any area of the screen outside of the Crystal UI removes the grey overlay and normal interaction with your menu system can resume.

Parameters:
activatedYES if the popovers have been activated or NO if not
- (void) crystalUiDeactivated [optional, inherited]

Reports to the client that the Crystal UI has been closed.This is a good place to reactivate the game from a paused state and reactivate sound.

+ (void) deactivateCrystalPullTab

Deactivates the Crystal pull tab user interface. This will animate the pull tab off screen.

+ (void) deactivateCrystalUI

Forces the Crystal UI to be removed from view.On iPhone in normal circumstances it shouldn't be necessary to call this method, but is added for completeness in case the client receives its own notifications.
On iPad this method is used to dismiss the Crystal navigation tabs at the left of the screen.

void CrystalUnityBasic::DeactivatePullTabUi ( ) [inline, inherited]

Deactivates the Crystal pull tab user interface. This will animate the pull tab off screen.

+ (void) displaySplashScreen

Displays the Crystal splash screenThis method displays the Crystal splash screen to the user above the current game UI. It is the responsibility of the developer to ensure that this dialog is displayed at an appropriate time, generally just after the game is started. When the splash screen has been dismissed splashScreenFinishedWithActivateCrystal: will be called in the delegate. Normally the game would only display this splash screen once to the user.

+ (BOOL) isCrystalUIActive

Determine if the Crystal UI is currently active and visible.Returns YES if active and visible, otherwise returns NO.

+ (void) lockToOrientation: (UIDeviceOrientation)  orientation

Locks the crystal UI to the specified orientation.Just call this once after initializing the session. All orientations are supported. If your application supports more than one screen orientation use lockToOrientationList: instead.

Parameters:
orientationThe orientation to lock the Crystal UI to
+ (void) lockToOrientationList: (NSArray *)  orientationList

Locks the crystal UI to the specified list of orientations.Just call this once after initializing the session. All orientations are supported. A typical usage of this call is to limit Crystal to only the landscape orientations like so: [CrystalSession lockToOrientationList:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:[NSNumber numberWithInt:UIDeviceOrientationLandscapeLeft], [NSNumber numberWithInt:UIDeviceOrientationLandscapeRight], nil] ];

Parameters:
orientationListThe list of orientations to lock the Crystal UI to
void CrystalUnityBasic::ResetCrystalPullTabState ( ) [inline, inherited]

This will animate the Crystal pull tab to the default closed position.

+ (void) resetCrystalPullTabState

This will animate the Crystal pull tab to the default closed postion.

- (void) splashScreenFinishedWithActivateCrystal: (BOOL)  activateCrystal [optional, inherited]

Reports to the client that the Crystal splash screen has been dismissedAfter the Crystal splash dialog (displaySplashScreen) has been dismissed the client will be notified with this method. The method can be used to resume the normal game startup and UI, and also to immediately activate the Crystal UI and encourage sign-up.

Parameters:
activateCrystalWill be set to YES if the user decided to activate Crystal. The game should activate the crystal UI at the next available opportunity in this case.
Generated on Thu May 5 2011 10:07:57 for Crystal SDK 2.1 for iOS by  1.7.3
